content.1: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,
content.2: How long wilt thou speak these
content.3: Doth God pervert judgment? or doth the Almighty pervert justice?
content.4: If thy children have sinned against him, and he have cast them away for their transgression;
content.5: If thou wouldest seek unto God betimes, and make thy supplication to the Almighty;
content.7: Though thy beginning was small, yet thy latter end should greatly increase.
content.8: For enquire, I pray thee, of the former age, and prepare thyself to the search of their fathers:
content.11: Can the rush grow up without mire? can the flag grow without water?
content.14: Whose hope shall be cut off, and whose trust
content.15: He shall lean upon his house, but it shall not stand: he shall hold it fast, but it shall not endure.
content.17: His roots are wrapped about the heap,
content.18: If he destroy him from his place, then
content.20: Behold, God will not cast away a perfect
content.21: Till he fill thy mouth with laughing, and thy lips with rejoicing.
content.22: They that hate thee shall be clothed with shame; and the dwelling place of the wicked shall come to nought.
